description: Our signature italian hoagie; capacola, salami and provolone cheese with lettuce, tomato, onion, seasoned with salt, pepper, and oregano.
Our signature american hoagie; american cheese, ham, and salami, with lettuce, tomato, onion, seasoned with salt, pepper, and oregano.
Low salt turkey, your choice of cheese, with lettuce, tomato, onion, seasoned with salt, pepper, and oregano.
Virgina baked ham, your choice of cheese, with lettuce, tomato, onion, seasoned with salt, pepper, and oregano.
Our homemade roast beef with provolone cheese.
Our homemade roast pork with provolone cheese.
Tuna salad mixed with mayo, chopped tomatoes, onions, celery, and lemon juice topped with lettuce, tomato and onions.
Roasted Chicken mixed with mayo, scallion, and dijon, topped with lettuce, tomato, and onions.
Our vegetarian hoagie with lettuce, tomato, onion and roasted red peppers.
Salami, fresh mozzerella, and pepper shooters.
Prosciutto, sharp provolone, and roasted peppers.
Hot sopressata, hot capocollo, calabrian chili paste, topped with fresh mozzerella, lettuce, tomato, and onions.
For our cheese lovers; provolone, swiss and cooper cheese.
Your choice of lunchmeat, cheese and toppings.
